gw.api.graph.print

Class ColoringDotFormatter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.graph.print.ColoringDotFormatter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DotFormatter<T>

    public class ColoringDotFormatter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DotFormatter<T>
    A decorating DotFormatter that colors nodes and/or edges.
    Author:
    bspies

      • setNodeColorer

        public void setNodeColorer(com.google.common.base.Function<T,java.awt.Color> nodeColorer)
        Sets the function for coloring the nodes. The function may return a null, in which case no color is set.
        Parameters:
        nodeColorer - Function to determine the color of a node

      • setEdgeColorer

        edgeColorer - Function to determine the color of an edge
